Description: Limestone tomb-relief block: bearing the names of Remu and Tjentet in sunk relief Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' III Memphis: A, Abu Rawash to Abusir (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 302.
Bibliographic references: James 1961 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc. Part 1 (pl.16)
Condition: Fair; there is some flaking through the action of salt.
